name: Emporio Ivankov
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn If this character has 7000 Power or more, play up to 1 <Revolutionary Army>-type character other than "Emporio Ivankov" with Power 5000 or less.

effect.text: If this character has 7000 Power or more, play up to 1 <Revolutionary Army>-type character other than "Emporio Ivankov" with Power 5000 or less.
